HELP: CV....................Downloads a copy of my resumé
SHARE.................Copies website URL to the clipboard
CLEAR.................Resets terminal to its initial window
HEADER................Sets the header for the terminal
THEME.................Sets the colour scheme for the terminal
For help about the settings, type HELP <CMD>, e.g. HELP THEME.
EXPERIENCE: Teacher & Batch Manager @ Le Wagon..............2021 - Present

Full - Stack Web Development Bootcamp...........Le Wagon
HELP CLEAR: Enter CLEAR to clean the history of the terminal.
HELP HEADER: Enter HEADER <YOUR_HEADER> to set a custom header for the terminal.
HELP THEME: Enter THEME <OPTION> to set the color theme for the terminal.
D|DARK...............Sets the color scheme to dark mode
L|LIGHT..............Sets the color scheme to light mode
THEME DARK: Terminal successfully updated to dark mode!
THEME D: Terminal successfully updated to dark mode!
THEME LIGHT: Terminal successfully updated to light mode!
THEME L: Terminal successfully updated to light mode!
